short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send interview requests to candidates from any page on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time by using this extension to copy and import interviewing candidates from your ATS (applicant tracking system) into the interviewstream powered by RIVS platform (video interviewing platform).   This will allow to you send On Demand interviews with a click of a button through the interviewstream powered by RIVS digital interviewing platform.
